channel.title: RuneScape Downloads For Your Server Website!
channel.description:
[size=30pt][b]HTML RuneScape Website Downloads![/b][/size] [size=12pt][i]100% Credits to Jagex.[/i][/size] HTML Home Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?mtydklgdmzi For Example: [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/svmlo0.jpg[/img] [size=14pt][u][i]How to edit:[/i][/u][/size] [i]First Step: For example: If you want to change the RuneFest 2010: Tickets now on General Sale. Simply open the HTML in your website you currently have the HTML on.[/i] [i]Second Step: Press CTRL + F & Search RuneFest 2010[/i] [i]Third Step: It should then come up with [b]

RuneFest 2010: Tickets Now on General Sale!

01-May-2010

RuneFest 2010 tickets are now on general sale, for anyone who wishes to purchase some. Read more...

[/b] Now simply just change the info to whatever you wish for example [b]

****Scape: Join Now!

01-May-2010

Please Join! Read more info...

[/b] As you see?[/i] HTML Forums Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?mtydklgdmzi For Example: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/331m55k.jpg[/img] [size=14pt][u][i]How to edit:[/i][/u][/size] [i]First Step: For example: If you want to change the RuneScape Forums. Simply open the HTML in your website you currently have the HTML on.[/i] [i]Second Step: Press CTRL + F & Search RuneScape Forums[/i] [i]Third Step: It should then come up with [b]RuneScape Forums [/b][/i] [i]Now simply just change the info to whatever you wish for example [b]****Scape Forums [/b] [i]As you see?[/i] [/i] HTML Help Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?ytkzjyzn11y For Example: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/21ls8xl.jpg[/img] [size=14pt][u][i]How to edit:[/i][/u][/size] [i]First Step: For example: If you want to change the Rules of RuneScape. Simply open the HTML in your website you currently have the HTML on.[/i] [i]Second Step: Press CTRL + F & Search Rules of RuneScape[/i] [i]Third Step: It should then come up with [b]">Rules of RuneScape
Information about our rules and why we have them. [/b][/i] [i]Now simply just change the info to whatever you wish for example [b]">Rules of RuneScape [/b] [u][size=14pt][i]How to edit a image:[/i][/size][/u] Now say, You want to change the picture next to Rules of RuneScape. Basically every time you search a title or info with a picture next to it, You will always see a image link which is the picture being used next to the title or info, For example [b]>

item.title: RuneScape Downloads For Your Server Website!
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

Wow, this hasnt been locked?

1) All content posted must be yours and yours ONLY! If broken, a punishment will be given depending on the material posted and the situation at hand. People helping out here and there is, of course, allowed, as long as the majority of the project belongs to you. There is an exception though: if it was a team project it is okay for all members to own credit and to be posted only if credit is given where credit is due.

To simplify that for you, DONT POST COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL
